tests.name: Quiz: QUESTIONS.txt
tests.description: Determines if the answers in QUESTIONS.txt are correct

tests.name: Code: struct_stride
tests.description: Runs struct_stride once and checks that the output format matches what is expected. Also checks that the timing results are ordered properly. From slowest to fastest should be: int_field_base, arr_field_base, int_field_optm, arr_field_optm.
